trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Chandler
There were no other sightings in Chandler on or around May 11th 2013
Summary: 10 + glowing orange orbs taking off seperately in the vicinity of chandler airport
divs: Sighting DetailsStopped to get food and an older gentleman was standing staring off in the distance shouting "what is that! what are those!!!" about 7 orange glowing orbs observed moving across the sky rising at a 45 degree angle, all in various positions not relating to each other. They were going higher and farther away. They were dim and seemed to flicker at the distance I guessed to be 5 miles away. Some of them floated close to each other and then there appeared to be only one. I looked around some trees blocking my view and observed 4 or 5 more taking off in 1 second intervals from the ground at a 45 degree angle in the direction of the other ones. The event was happening over near the chandler airport.
